scripts.build-slow: lerna run build --scope=@openassistant/utils && lerna run build --npm-client=yarn --concurrency=1 --ignore=@openassistant/utils
scripts.version-prerelease: lerna version prerelease --no-push --sync-workspace-lock --no-git-tag-version --force-publish && ts-node scripts/update-version.mjs && yarn install
scripts.version-patch: lerna version patch --no-push --sync-workspace-lock --no-git-tag-version --force-publish && ts-node scripts/update-version.mjs && yarn install
scripts.version-minor: lerna version minor --no-push --sync-workspace-lock --no-git-tag-version --force-publish && ts-node scripts/update-version.mjs && yarn install
scripts.version-major: lerna version major --no-push --sync-workspace-lock --no-git-tag-version --force-publish && ts-node scripts/update-version.mjs && yarn install
scripts.publish-dry-run: turbo run publish && lerna publish from-package --yes --dry-run
scripts.publish-preview: turbo run publish && lerna publish from-package --yes --dist-tag preview
scripts.publish-release: turbo run publish && lerna publish from-package --yes
